name: Numix Tabs for Firefox 29+
description: A tab style for Firefox based on the Numix GTK Theme (http://numixproject.org) and on Numix for Firefox. Changes tab toolbar, tab appearance, and nav toolbar.
additional_info:
This style adds styling to the tab bar to fit the Numix GTK Theme (http://numixproject.org). It is based on and is compatible with Numix for Firefox. Also check out the adaptation of this style for Thunderbird: Numix Tabs for Thunderbird 15+. Tested with Firefox 39â€“42, Stylish 2.0.2 and Numix GTK Theme on Linux Mint 17.2 Cinnamon 2.6 64bit. This style is not going to be actively maintained, but feel free to make any tweaks. Version 1.2 7 Nov 2015
  • icons in tab bar changed to dark version
  • "busy" and "progress" throbbers now use icons adapted from the Numix icon theme.
  • minor fix for the nav bar
Version 1.1 3 Nov 2015
  • thin dark line between tab bar and nav bar removed
Version 1 6 Aug 2015
  • changes tab bar appearance
  • changes tab appearance
  • surpresses default 'curvy' tabs
  • blue instead of orange throbber icon
